name: NuGetRestore
description: Restores NuGet packages in preparation for a Visual Studio Build step.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Path to solution, packages.config, or project.json
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to solution, packages.config, or project.json file that references the packages to be restored.

inputs.name: selectOrConfig
inputs.label: Feeds (package sources) to use
inputs.helpMarkDown: To select one feed from VSTS and/or NuGet.org select them here. For multiple feeds, commit a nuget.config file to your source code repository and set its path here.

inputs.name: feed
inputs.label: The feed to include in the generated NuGet.config.

inputs.name: includeNuGetOrg
inputs.label: Include NuGet.org in the generated NuGet.config.

inputs.name: nugetConfigPath
inputs.label: Path to NuGet.config
inputs.helpMarkDown: The NuGet.config in your repository that specifies the feeds from which to restore packages.

inputs.name: noCache
inputs.label: Disable local cache
inputs.helpMarkDown: Equivalent to the -NoCache NuGet.exe command line argument

inputs.name: packagesDirectory
inputs.label: Destination directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Equivalent to the -PackagesDirectory NuGet.exe command line argument

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version specification
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A version or version range that specifies the NuGet version to make available on the path. See the [list of available NuGet versions](http://dist.nuget.org/tools.json).

If you want to match a pre-release version, the specification must contain a major, minor, patch, and pre-release version from the list above.

Examples: 4.x, 3.3.x, 2.8.6, >=4.0.0-0

inputs.name: checkLatest
inputs.label: Always download the latest matching version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Always check for and download the latest available version of NuGet.exe which satisfies the version spec. This option will also always incur download time and costs, even if the selected version of NuGet is already cached.

Enabling this option could cause unexpected build breaks when a new version of NuGet is released.

messages.Warning_NoConfigForNoCredentialProvider: To connect to NuGet feeds hosted in your Team Services account/TFS project collection on this build agent, edit your build definition to choose a higher version of nuget or specify a path to a NuGet.config containing the package sources you wish to use.
messages.Warning_ConflictingNuGetPreference: NuGet 3.3 was selected, but a custom NuGet path was provided. The custom path will be preferred. To resolve this warning, edit your build task and select 'custom' for NuGet version under Advanced.
messages.ConnectingAs: Connecting to feeds in your Team Services account/TFS project collection as '%s' [%s]
messages.BuildIdentityPermissionsHint: For internal feeds, make sure the build service identity '%s' [%s] has access to the feed.
messages.NoCredProviderOnAgent: CredentialProvider.TeamBuild.exe not found on the agent. Falling back to config-based credential flow.
messages.NotARegularFile: %s i not a solution file. Check the 'path to solution or packages.config' property of the NuGetInstaller task.
messages.CouldNotFindNuGetService: Could not find the NuGet service. This task will be unable to authenticate to feeds hosted in your Team Services account/TFS project collection.
messages.NoNuGetSpecified: If 'custom' is selected, you must provide a path to NuGet.exe
messages.NGCommon_IgnoringNuGetExtensionsPath: Detected NuGet extensions loader path (NUGET_EXTENSIONS_PATH environment variable). Extensions are ignored when using the built-in NuGet client
messages.NGCommon_DetectedNuGetExtensionsPath: Detected NuGet extensions loader path (NUGET_EXTENSIONS_PATH environment variable): %s
messages.NGCommon_SpsNotFound: Unable to find the '%s' [%s] area. There may be a problem with your Team Foundation Server installation.
messages.NGCommon_AreaNotFoundInSps: Unable to locate the '%s' [%s] area. The service containing that area may not be available in your region.
messages.NGCommon_NuGetConfigIsPackagesConfig: Expected a NuGet.config file at %s, but its contents appear to be a packages.config. Check the settings for the %s task and confirm you selected NuGet.config rather than packages.config.
messages.NGCommon_RemovingSources: Preparing to set credentials in NuGet.config
messages.NGCommon_NoSourcesFoundInConfig: No package sources were found in the NuGet.config file at %s
messages.Info_ExpectBehaviorChangeWhenUsingVersio: You are using a query match on the version string. Behavior changes or breaking changes might occur as NuGet updates to a new version.
messages.Error_NoVersionWasFoundWhichMatches: No version was found which matches the input %s
messages.Error_NoUrlWasFoundWhichMatches: No download URL was found for %s
messages.Warning_UpdatingNuGetVersion: Updating version of NuGet.exe to %s from %s. Behavior changes or breaking changes might occur as NuGet updates to a new version. If this is not desired, uncheck the 'Check for Latest Version' option in the task.
